text: Melissa Joan Hart recently revealed that she had a brief fling with Ryan Reynolds back in her Sabrina the Teenage Witch days and was quite 'smitten' with him, but ultimately put an end to it. Apparently he was no Pauly Shore! Well, she actually had to end it with Ryan because she had a boyfriend at the time,... read full story
title: E! NEWS EXCLUSIVE: Melissa Joan Hart Takes the E!Q in 42, Reveals Just How Interesting Her Taste in Guys Was in the 1990s
